profile.title: User Profile
profile.mustLogin: Settings hmuh theih nan i login duh a ngai a ni.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Thumal leh lehkha thar (translation) ang chiangin hrilh rawh
profile.filterExplicit: Thumal dik lo te ṭha chhuah
profile.allowExplicitContent: Thumal dik lo te pawm rawh
profile.saveError: Thil dik lo: Settings a dah thei lo.
profile.avatarSuccess: Avatar upload a lo ni ta!
profile.noPrivateKey: Device ah private key awm lo a ni, export thei lo.
profile.setBackupPassword: Backup encrypt tur password dah rawh:
profile.importSuccess: Private key device ah import a lo ni ta.
profile.importFailed: Key import a hlawh lo (password dik lo emaw file damage emaw).
profile.keysRotated: Key pair thar siam a ni ta, public key upload a ni ta.
profile.rotateFailed: Key siam thar a hlawh lo.
profile.keyDisclaimer: I private key hi device aṭangin a chhuak lo. A dang device-ah hman turin password zawngin aṭanga copy export rawh.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Incoming call leh text te chu i phona emaw email thliar avangin hruai rawh. Outgoing call/text te chu i Chatforia number ang chiangin lang thei.

chat.selectPrompt: Text emaw chat room emaw thlan la in chhuak rawh
